text: mainne unase usake siva aur kuchh nahin kaha, jisaka toone mujhe aadesh diya tha, yah ki allaah kee bandagee karo, jo mera bhee rab hai aur tumhaara bhee rab hai. aur jab tak main unamen raha unakee khabar rakhata tha, phir jab toone mujhe utha liya to phir too hee unaka nireekshak tha. aur too hee har cheez ka saakshee hai
